import React, {useState} from 'react' import {useLocation, useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import {Form, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' const ShippingScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) const {shippingAddress} = cart const [address, setAddress] = useState(shippingAddress.address) const [city, setCity] = useState('') const [postalCode, setPostalCode] = useState('') const [country, setCountry] = useState('') const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log('Submit') } return (
